game.name: Animals Memory: Dogs
game.shortDescription: Memory Animals: Dogs is a card game with pictures of different dogs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game is aimed at fans of dogs.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Memory Animals: Dogs is a card game with pictures of different dogs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game is aimed at fans of dogs.

reviewHighlights.text: Suitable memory game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults with 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to...
